# EpiPulse Community

This space supports discussion on public health research, data analysis, and capacity building.

## Start Here

- Welcome and community guidelines
- Public health data analysis discussions
- AI-assisted epidemiology workflows
- Student and early-career questions

## Community Norms

- Be respectful and evidence-focused
- Avoid sharing identifiable or sensitive data
- Cite sources where possible
- Keep discussions practical and reproducible
